item.title: MA Backlog
item.description: Add new items here: https://malpedia.caad.fkie.fraunhofer.de/login and see also here https://objective-see.org/. Types From ChatGPT File infectors: These viruses infect executable files and are spread when the infected file is executed.

item.title: Process Injections
item.description: Windows Most of the information is taken from here, but more visualization is added. The screenshots from IDA Pro are also copied from that blog post.
